properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Cape Elizabeth, ME to Merrimack River, MA out 25 NM
properties.headline: Storm Warning issued February 7 at 2:36AM EST until February 8 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 kt with gusts up to 55 kt and seas 7
to 15 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Cape Elizabeth, ME to Merrimack
River, MA out 25 NM.

* WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 1 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Very strong winds will cause hazardous seas which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will be from 4 to 8pm
when gusts to 60kts are possible.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should remain in port, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY
